title: What is a good edtech business idea? - Quora

response.answer_text: Edtech is a fascinating new industry that is getting more and more attention lately. If I had to pursue an idea in this field, I would go with gamification. It’s a good technique to make learning more fun and engaging with students, so if you could find a way to create a product or a service that can do this, you have a winner! Go with your passions and good luck!

I can write a long list for this one. However, I’ll give you a short answer instead - which will make you think in the right direction. My Short Answer - The one that solves a problem that impacts a lot of people! Go out there and Talk to your target market … and never stop talking!
